Download¶

Source Code¶

JOA is an open source code project. You can browse and download JOA source code from github and run it as a Java project.

Executable¶

You can download JOA executable jar from here and run it.

Sample BED Files¶

You can download sample BED files and run JOA.

Explanation Sample BED Files (tar.gz)
Download sample BED files SampleBEDFiles.tar.gz
